scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: vite build && cd server && npm run build
scripts.db:init: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U teu -d teu < server/schema.sql
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U teu -d teu < server/migrations/001_add_projects.sql
